pkgmetadata.longdescription: # meiga 🧙 [![version](https://img.shields.io/github/release/alice-biometrics/meiga/all.svg)](https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga/releases) [![ci](https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga/workflows/ci/badge.svg)](https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga/actions) [![pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/meiga)](https://pypi.org/project/meiga/) [![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/alice-biometrics/meiga/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=BX1IZJZLJQ)](https://codecov.io/gh/alice-biometrics/meiga)[![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)[![Imports: isort](https://img.shields.io/badge/%20imports-isort-%231674b1?style=flat&labelColor=ef8336)](https://pycqa.github.io/isort/)[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/alice-biometrics/meiga.svg)](https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga/blob/main/LICENSE)[![versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/meiga.svg)](https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga)---**Documentation**: https://alice-biometrics.github.io/meiga/**Source Code**: https://github.com/alice-biometrics/meiga---## What is meiga 🧙?`meiga 🧙` is a Python µframework that provides a simple, fully typed, monad-based result type ➡️ `Result[Value, Error]`.## How could meiga 🧙 help me?`meiga 🧙` provides a simple and clear way of handling errors in Python without using `Exceptions`. This package improves the Dev Experience as it allows to know all possible typed responses. With Meiga 🧙 your IDE will help you much more. ## Installation 💻```consolepip install meiga```## Contribute We'd love you to contribute to *meiga* 🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳🥳️️!For more information, check our [documentation](https://alice-biometrics.github.io/meiga/contributing/)## Contact 📬support@alicebiometrics.com
